column1: Your query : (TITLE-ABS-KEY(( "machine learning" OR "neural networks" OR "deep learning" OR "physics-informed neural networks" OR "finite differences" OR "finite difference method" OR "finite elements" OR "finite element method" OR "finite volumes" OR "spectral methods" OR "pseudo-spectral" ) AND (modeling OR modelling OR model OR simulation) ) AND PUBYEAR > 2009 AND PUBYEAR < 2025)
